desc: Welcome to our Shopify site :) ... we offer a wide range of items from boutique outfits & customized products to products to help you get started with your cricut and similar machines :) .

layout.text: Thank you stopping by our shop. See something you like but not in your size let us know and we can fix that :) . Check out our booth locations at The red wheel barrow in Geraldine & Two peas in a pod in Fyffe❤️
